title: Increase Champion Select Time/Better Role Selection
body:
I'm finding that the time it takes **once **loaded into the Champion Select screen for Normals in Beta client is not long enough.

So you load in, everyone calls lanes, there are often fights about who called first or simply someone who can't play a particular role. Once that has finally been sorted, the last few attempts I've had less than 10 seconds to actually **select** my champion for the role I am "delegated" to. This has been incredibly frustrating and meant I have had a time-ban imposed on me because I was not able to select a champ quick enough.

I'd love other people's thoughts on what we can do to improve it. Obviously as we move forward with selecting the Role you want then you will queue up for those roles but until that is done, thoughts and opinions.

replies.body:
having a role selector for norms would be top. But i think Riot would just say it will increase que times too much.

I'd rather wait 5 more mins for a normal for a desired role then always keep fingers crossed that no one is about to argue and troll over a role.

Im totally down for Riot to change norms so that we can pre-select roles before heading into queue. 

Just make it so the one normals queue we have works this way (so the population won't be split between more queues) and enable autofill. I think the queue times wouldn't be too much, most champ selects I get into have at least 1 person call "fill".

Exactly, like I'd rather wait a little longer during queue phase so that I know I've got a better chance at getting my desired role rather than hoping people don't argue because if that happens, I don't have enough time to select a champ and it bans me for time-out.
